Quick Facts

EXIT   X

TERRORIST  FINANCING

Page

Table of Contents

 

Freezable assets are assets that have been blacklisted or are owned or controlled by blacklisted persons or organisations. It is an offence to:

 

•

use or deal with freezable assets

•

allow freezable assets to be used or dealt with

•

facilitate the use or dealing with freezable assets

•

make any asset available (directly or indirectly) to a person or organisation that has been blacklisted

 

Assets include funds, shares, securities, cheques or any document or instrument which is evidence of a title or interest in property.
